name: BrainMR
description:
This is a capstone project for Team2 on the Microsoft Student Learn Ambassador Mixed Reality Bootcamp, 2021. This Project focuses on teaching secondary school students on the basic parts of the human brain while also enabling them to practically visualize and interact with every parts of the brain as though they were real. This would literally give them an edge over the traditional classroom learning where they are made to learn those things from drawings/images in a textbook.

Download the .appxbundle file > BrainMR_x.x.xx.x_ARM64_Master.zip
You need to enable the Windows Device Portal to sideload apps on HoloLens 2.
Once the Device Portal is active, follow these instructions:

  1. Ensure any existing versions of BrainMR on the device are uninstalled.
  2. Access the Device Portal and navigate to the Apps page.
  3. Under the Install app heading, for App package select the “BrainMR_x.x.xx.x_ARM64_Master” (Open box icon).
  4. Select 'Allow me to select framework packages' checkbox > Next > Browse.
  5. In the app folder, Select "BrainMR_x.x.xx.x_ARM64_Master.appx" file.
  6. Hit "Install/Go" and wait for the install to complete.
